verbose_text: As IL-15 enhances granzyme B induction in memory CD8 + T cells early upon Ag re-exposure, CD8 + T cells persisting in the CNS of both wt and IL-15 -/- mice were thus compared for granzyme B expression and Ag specific IFN-gamma secretion.
evidence: enhances granzyme B induction in memory CD8 +  T cells early upon Ag re-exposure              , CD8 +  T cells persisting in the CNS of both wt and IL-15 -/-  mice were thus compared for granzyme B
